org.terrier.realtime.memory

Class MemoryDirectIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.realtime.memory.MemoryDirectIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, PostingIndex<MemoryPointer>

    public class MemoryDirectIndex
extends Object
implements PostingIndex<MemoryPointer>
    This is a DirectIndex structure that is held fully in memory, it is based upon the MemoryInverted class. It does not currently support blocks or fields.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Richard McCreadie
